body:
Are you looking for **Biden VP Odds**? 

Joe has said he'll be choosing a woman from the list of possible Democratic Vice Presidential Candidates. 

And we know which ones. In order of probability.

- - -

## **2020 Biden VP Odds**

<canvas id='g11' name="brgraph" data-file-name="DemocraticVPOdds.json" data-only-names="Kamala Harris,Susan Rice,Val Demings,Tammy Duckworth,Elizabeth Warren,Karen Bass" data-start="2020-03-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

As you can see, and probably already know, Kamala Harris is the clear front runner. She's fluctuated between a 30-50% chance since March. We expect this to continue.

Her biggest threats are where it gets interesting. 

Susan Rice is the big improver in the last few weeks, clearly moving into second position. 

And Tammy Duckworth isn't far behind.

Elizabeth Warren seems to have peaked, similar to her Presidential campaign, but she's certainly capable of a late rally.

Val Demings was Kamala Harris' biggest challenger six weeks ago but she's now heading to 5%.

- - -

## **Where Do We Get Accurate Biden VP Odds?**

We pull data from Betfair where over $1,500,000 USD has been traded. 

We rely exclusively relies on **[The Wisdom Of Crowds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wisdom_of_Crowds)**. Which means everyone's opinion is given weight.

You will not find a more accurate data source for Biden VP Odds.

Keep coming back to our site as Joe gets closer to a decision.
title: Biden VP Odds: Your Inside Info
seoTitle: Looking for Biden VP Odds (Democratic Vice Presidential Candidates)?
description: Are you looking for Biden VP Odds? In a strong female field of Democratic Vice Presidential Candidates, lets find out who Joe Biden will be choosing as his running mate.
